entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot install maui-android workload on Ubuntu 24.04 in Docker #22588
  • [Android] Convert Modal Implementation over to using Dialog Fragment #22587
    .NET 9 Planning
  • iOS Notification Service Extension Deploy Fails #22586
  • Provide a formalized mechanism with BindableObjects, so we can update the values but not trigger a handler update #22585
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SwipeView Items could not be centered vertically when content is multirow grid #22581
    Backlog
  • SwipeView shows what's beneath while still swiping #22580
    Backlog
  • Unable to debug MAUI android source code as it contains the bug because VS 2022 cannot find source symbol files #22577
  • Maui.Controls.Compatibility.StackLayout; add children, chidlren.clear, re-add children -> System.Object.DisposedException #22575
  • RowDefinitions=Star not rendering properly (Xamarin migration) #22571
    Backlog
  • iOS flyoutmenu with flyout content as collectionview doesn't respect flyout width #22567
  • [Android] Disabled Picker view intercepts GestureRecognizer of parent container #22565
    Backlog
  • Issue with Drawing View in TabbedPage #22564
    Backlog
  • Simple shell navigation causes Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed was unhandled. #22563
    Backlog

Closed

  • Binding Border.StrokeShape stopped working in 8.0.60-ci.net8.10665 #22549
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Radiobutton custom content is not displaying on Android #7881
    Backlog
  • Bindings to Width and Height of a Control never stop triggering, even if size did not change at all. #22432
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Top most ListView bound to an ObservableCollection, does not always update list of records, when adding or removing new items #22569
  • Exception using <Frame> in a databound ListView on Android #22568
  • Newly installed VS 2022 In combination with Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compativility leads to The type or namespace name 'MauiWinUIApplication' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Maui' #22515
  • [Android] MAUI 8.0.3 -> 8.0.6 regression: custom handler with key listener no longer works #21109
    Backlog
  • ImageButton Padding stops working with .NET 8 #22364
    .NET 8 SR6
  • ImageButton ripple effect stops working with .NET 8 #18857
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Android Java Library Binding breaks intellisense, despite build/run working #21777
    Backlog
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS #22570
  • [Android & iOS]: In ListView with IsPullToRefreshEnabled enabled the PullToRefresh activity indicator remains stuck and doesnt get closed in .net 8 MAUI #22532
  • Window.SizeChanged fired moving MainWindow #17991
    Backlog
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21439

PullRequests

Created

  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    community ✨
  • Support changing Window coordinates while changing those coordinates #22583
  • [testing] Move XUnit back to 2.5.3 #22582
  • Fix TapGestureRecognizer disregards parent's IsEnabled status #22578
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Allow custom background drawable with a custom handler #22573
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-editor

Merged

  • Only the library projects updates build numbers #22554
    area-infrastructure, .NET 8 SR6
  • Binding Border.StrokeShape stopped working - fix #22558
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [Android] Allow custom handler with key listener #22546
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [android] fix design-time build on project creation #22559
    area-tooling
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨

Updated

  • Update appium/drivers versions #22552
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    legacy-area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • [WinUI] Optimize `TransformationExtensions` #22481
    area-animation, community ✨, t/perf
  • [XC] Compile TemplateBindingExtension #22008
    area-xaml
  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger - fix #22503
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Remove IgnoreIfPlatforms usage on UITests #22526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Weak Parent #22561
    area-controls-general, t/perf
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
